name: Red Eyes In The Woods [PC]
description:
RED EYES IN THE WOODS

You wake up to find yourself in the woods, and you realize that you're not alone there.

There's an evil 'thing' in these woods. So be prepared for a good gaming experience!

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?

You need to go near and disable all 7 GREEN  wireless sets.

Beware of the RED ones though, they are pretty dangerous.

Disable all wireless sets before 'It' gets to you.

Good Luck,  Subject!
